= Introduction =

Scalide is a visual frontend for the scala interpreter. It is free and aims to make learning scala an easier and faster experience.

Check out the Scalide blog at: 
http://scalide.blooger.com

Discuss in the Scalide google group at:
http://groups.google.com/group/scalide
